title: Cajun-style eggs Benedict
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '250ml milk', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 dash hot pepper sauce', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '4 large savoury scones, halved', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '225g smoked sausage, halved then cut into 5cm pieces', '8 eggs']
